thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: U.S. appeals court hands Facebook win in EveryMD messaging patent case

author: Jan Wolfe
title: U.S. appeals court hands Facebook win in EveryMD messaging patent case

organizations.name: u.s. federal circuit court of appeals

text:
Facebook Inc on Friday prevailed in a lawsuit brought by an Internet physician directory accusing the social networking giant of infringing online messaging patents.
The U.S. Federal Circuit Court of Appeals affirmed a lower court decision invalidating two patents over which EveryMD.com LLC had sued Facebook on the grounds that they describe abstract ideas not eligible for protection.
To read the full story on Westlaw Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2p2KQfP
